comments.author: AysonCurrax.3254
comments.body: I think that might be possible to do once the v2 APIs get released, seeing how they will enable access to account information by having the user login with their account pretty much. the friendslist could be something that might be accessible through that particular API. sadly, nothing detailed is known to this point.

comments.author: hip.8435
comments.body: There was talk of making a friends list app for smartphones, specifically Apple’s iPhone. It would be nice to receive pop-up notifications of when friends came on-line. What ever came of this idea\project? I think it’s an easy enough step that would set this game apart from other MMO’s and help sustain GW2’s high player population.
